page.title: 16FARMING
page.content: Equipment includes a J.C.B. loader, 1 large combine, 1 large round & 1 square bailer. Staff on the farm consists of manager, dairyman, 3 tractor drivers, 1 Youth Training Scheme boy. Farm manager's children go to school in Cranborne & Wimborne St. Giles. Wife is member of P.C.C. & governor of children's school. Farm cottage available for holiday letting. Farm manager lives in modern bungalow.Other buildings comprise dairy calf shed, covered cattle yard for winter. The old Farmhouse will open shortly as a small 7 bedroom hotel. Is owned by couple with 2 adult children who will run the hotel.
